author: Tucker Reals
title: Coronavirus updates: Progress, but the COVID-19 "beast is still alive"
description: In some of the hardest-hit nations and America's own virus ground-zero, unprecedented shutdowns are turning the tide, but in some places, patience is wearing thin.
content:
India recorded its biggest single-day jump in coronavirus cases on Sunday, with 1,553 new patients, government data show. India's Health Ministry said the spike brought the total number of COVID-19 cases in the country to 17,265.
The number of deaths rose by… [+1110 chars]
